Summary: Chrome sphere streaks across Phoenix sky
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: June 6, 2005 between 11:30 and 12 noon two co-workers and I was standing outside our office in South Phoenix when I look up in the sky to watch a couple of airplanes take off (The office is only a couple of miles from the airport)and something caught my eye. It just happened I could see what looked like a chrome sphere reflecting light at a very high (I m guessing over 10,000 ft)altitude in the northern sky. I told my two co-workers to check it out. When one of them suggested it was a weather balloon another similar sphere appeared from no where and approached the first sphere they appeared to be somewhat stationary but were kind of bobbing ever so slightly. They were so far up it was hard for me to keep focus on them. We finished smoking (about three minutes)and when we looked back up in the sky we saw one streaking at a high rate of speed heading northwest toward Nevada. As a side note: The object was very similar to the silver spheres that have been recently shown on various UFO documentaries.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Goodyear
There were no other sightings in Goodyear on or around June 12th 2005
